mapper.select: select * from gy_report_teacher_experimental order by cId desc
select cId, cTeacherId, cExperimentalTestId from gy_report_teacher_experimental where cId = #{cId }
select cId, cTeacherId, cExperimentalTestId from gy_report_teacher_experimental where cTeacherId = #{cTeacherId }
select count(cTeacherId) from gy_report_teacher_experimental where cTeacherId = #{cTeacherId }
mapper.update:
update gy_report_teacher_experimental
cTeacherId = #{cTeacherId },
cExperimentalTestId = #{cExperimentalTestId },
where cId = #{cId }
